thought: The emailType param does not support expression, so it must be set as a fixed string in params, not as an expression. Also, 'options' param should be an empty object. I will rewrite action_1 to set 'emailType' to 'text' directly in params, not using expression.
plan: Rewrite action_1 params to set 'sendTo', 'subject', 'message' as expressions from input_data json.
Set 'emailType' param as fixed string 'text' (no expression).
Test action_1 to verify email sending works.
criticism: Current action_1 param 'emailType' uses expression which is unsupported, causing execution error.
